title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters Dialog Details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters dialog details include duplicated name validation on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The spacing between the button and list is too large. The top button should align with the dialog top. The table lacks a label for mnemonic purposes. The absence of multiple selection capability prevents applying 'move up'/'move down' actions to more than one item. The signature preview text overflows its container. Additionally, the signature preview lacks a background color resembling the hover color.
EB: The spacing between the button and list should be adjusted for optimal alignment. A label should be added to the table for mnemonic inclusion. Enable multiple selection functionality to allow 'move up'/'move down' actions on multiple items. Adjust the signature preview to wrap within its container. Set the background color of the signature preview to match the hover color.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe the excessive spacing between the button and list.
3. Note the absence of a label for the table.
4. Attempt to perform 'move up'/'move down' actions on multiple items.
5. Observe the signature preview text overflowing its container and lacking the appropriate background color.
